title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Syrian Military Post in Retaliation to Cross-Border Attacks: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a Syrian military post in response to launches towards Israeli territory.

A number of launches that crossed from Syrian territory into Israeli territory were identified a short time ago, landing in open areas. An alert was activated in an open area in the Home Front Command settlement.

IDF forces attacked the sources of fire in Syria with artillery, and IDF tanks attacked a Syrian military post in response to the launches.

Additionally, earlier today (Monday), a number of launches were identified from the Lebanese territory towards the area of Kiryat Shmona.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the post: https://bit.ly/3v6v8pS
